Plot: A video game where you play as sailor, privateer and assassin Edward Kenway exploring on and around the islands in the Caribbean Sea during the early 18th century.
Title: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag
Writer: Liz Albl (Script Intern), Nicholas Grimwood (additional dialogue), Jean Guesdon (story), Mark Hill (additional dialogue), Mustapha Mahrach (story), Corey May (additional dialogue), Darby McDevitt (lead writer), Jill Murray (Aveline DLC lead writer)
Actors: Ralph Ineson, Sarah Greene, Sean Pertwee, Nolan North
